wine_description.prompt: With one sentence, describe this wine in an exciting way and highlight how it is unique: {{wine_name}}

wine_popularity.prompt: Write about what makes this wine so popular: {{wine_name}}

wine_fun_fact.prompt: Tell me something unique and funny about the winery which makes this wine: {{wine_name}}

wine_history.prompt: Write about the history of this wine: {{wine_name}}

wine_pairing.prompt: Write about foods that go well with: {{wine_name}}

wine_style.prompt: Picking from this list of wine types: red wine, white wine, rose wine, sparkling wine, and dessert wine, which wine type does this wine belong to: {{wine_name}} ?

wine_country.prompt: In three words or less, tell me the country name that this wine is from: {{wine_name}}
